item.title: Always an Optimist Soft Radiance Setting Powder
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description: Mica, Calcium Carbonate, Silica, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Magnesium Myristate, Nylon-12, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Caprylyl Glycol, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Magnesium Stearate, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Squalane, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, [+/- May Contain/Peut Contenir: Iron Oxides (CI 77492, CI 77491, CI 77499), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140)].
item.content:encoded:
What it is: A silky, do-it-all, talc-free loose setting powder to visibly smooth, blur, and control shine for a soft natural finish and all-day comfort.

Coverage: Light

Finish: Natural

Formulation: Loose Powder

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Super-finely milled and silky to the touch, this powder goes on light and airy to provide sheer, seamless coverage with a subtle but visible radiance and a natural finish. Extend makeup wear, blur the look of pores, and smooth skin’s texture. The custom-designed sifter locks for mess-free storage on the go.

Clinical Results:
REAL RESULTS
100% said it doesn’t look cakey or chalky
100% said it layers well and doesn’t disturb makeup
98% said it blurs and smooths the look of pores
*In an independent consumer perception study of 50 subjects
